channel.title: can we have a tattoos and piercings thread
channel.description:
this week im getting my nipples pierced/a deathly hallows symbol tattoo or just a dark mark on the inside of my arm so i decided 2 make a thread 2 discuss ur body modifications yall no matter what they may be my ears are stretched to 5/8 and i plan to go bigger
talk about ur various body modifications and post pictures if u want i dont care (the like 4 of you that are even old enough)

item.title: can we have a tattoos and piercings thread
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Dat font.

Never change.

I’ve considered getting some tattoos, but don’t know what I would actually like to get. I don’t think any would really fit my aesthetic, but I’m growing bored of jeans and t-shirts…

I don’t think I would get piercings, I just wouldn’t want to deal with any hassle they might bring. (I don’t know if they would bring any after healing >_>)

item.title: can we have a tattoos and piercings thread
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
I’m ok with tats and piercings on men and women for the most part. Well, as long as it’s not a huge mish-mash of random, clashing crap… Even then, it’s not that I feel any animosity at all, I just think it looks kind of trashy when it’s overdone.

Myself, I currently have no tats and one piercing. I look like a total dweeb and/or tool, so tats don’t really fit my look/personality. Neither do piercings, really. But then again, most of my friends and family don’t know about my 6-g PA. It’s not really the thing you go around showing off to people :zip:

Read full topic
